product_name: The North Face GTD Tank Top - Women's
long_description: The North Face GTD Tank Top for women keeps you cool during workouts in hot weather thanks to moisture-wicking FlashDry(TM) fibers. FlashDry fibers dramatically improve dry time and breathability; polyester fabric wicks away sweat to keep you comfortable during exertion. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times, resists odors and will not wash out. Mesh panels at sides and arms promote cooling airflow. Reflective logos on The North Face GTD sleeveless T-shirt help keep you visible; fabric offers a UV-protective rating of UPF 50+.
short_description: The North Face GTD Tank Top for women keeps you cool during workouts in hot weather thanks to moisture-wicking FlashDry(TM) fibers.
